roleset.name: to assault sexually
roleset.note: RAPE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rape' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rape.01-v predicate notes)
RAPE-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from rape.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: I mean , [0] these folks are so uptight that they blame pretty Kate for the fact that when she was a teen-ager [*T*-1], someone tied her hands behind her back , thrust her head into a gunny sack , brutally raped and beat her , and then left her to die in a cold-storage room .
